title: Rust Attack!
description: The city that never rusts . . . is rusting!The city that never rusts . . . is rusting! The well-loved robotic dance troupe, the Automettes, has been struck down by rust, and who else would they call on but Robot City Confidential Investigations — the city’s premier private detective agency? Detectives Rod and Mike smell a rat. Can they track down the villain and find a cure before rust panic spreads? This thrill-packed graphic novel will grip readers with its action, adventure, and humor.
author: Paul Collicutt
